response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value for us, but given its significance to you, we believe it's a perfect match. We propose to sell it to you for $950,000. This price reflects the quality and importance of the product while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. We are confident that this offer presents a mutually beneficial solution for both parties. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
